title: Bitter Reflections
description: Note: Alternate/new cover edition for ASIN# B00BJORTT6The Coffee Cafe is a place where friends are made, lovers meet and relationships begin. Of Course, how they will end is yet to be known...Sara was supposed to be starting her new life, new flat, new job, new man. That was the plan but it just wasn't happening. All that changes when Sara misses her bus one day and her new sexy supervisor offers to give her a lift, it sparks off a passionate affair that leaves her breathless and feeling alive.That is until Sara is caught up in scandal at work that could lead to her being arrested, confused and alone she shuts herself away from the world. Can she find the strength to clear her name? Can she uncover the truth about what really happened? Who can she trust?Jamie loved her from the first moment he met her, but Sara is not the woman he thought she was. Can he become the man to offer Sara the love she so desperately craves? Or is he destined to become just a bad memory.Bitter Reflections is a romance that follows Sara through a tough time in her life where she needs to take responsibility for the mistakes in her past and learn to take control of love and life.* Contains adult language and adult themes.
author: C.R. McBride
